testcase.name: Successfully adding a product to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Demoblaze homepage........................................passed And I Select the the laptop category........................................passed Then select click on any laptop related item................................passed And I click on the "Add to cart" button.....................................passed And I click on the "OK" button in the alert dialog..........................passed Then I click on the cart icon...............................................passed And I should see my selected item in the cart...............................passed
